assessments.status_rationale: No definitive report of the 10Y closing yield hitting 4.10% or lower in today’s coverage; deadline remains in the future.
October 2025 PPI has not been released yet (due by 2025-11-15); no figures in today’s news.
No Walmart Q3 FY2026 earnings or U.S. eCommerce growth figures reported; only an IoT deployment item was noted.
Coverage mentions rising U.S.–China trade tensions and rare earth concerns, but no clear announcement of new Chinese export licensing restrictions.
No AAA national average gasoline price print cited; threshold has not been confirmed or refuted.
Performance window from 2025-10-15 close to 2025-11-30 close is ongoing; no conclusive relative performance reported.
September 2025 JOLTS quits rate has not been released (due by 2025-11-06); no data in today’s news.
No mention of the 10Y–2Y spread closing at or above -0.05 pp; deadline is still ahead.
No Brent front-month settlement price provided; no confirmation of ≥ $88 settlement.
Today’s items do not report a ≥2% daily drop in the S&P 500; event could still occur before the deadline.
